questions.name: project_name
questions.question: What is the CMake project name?

questions.name: cmake_version
questions.question: What is the minimum CMake version required?

questions.name: cpp_files_count
questions.question: How many .cpp files are in the src/ directory?

questions.name: h_files_count
questions.question: How many .h files are in the src/ directory?

questions.name: source_directory
questions.question: What directory contains the source files?

questions.name: add_test_count
questions.question: How many add_test commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?

questions.name: target_link_libraries_count
questions.question: How many target_link_libraries commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?

questions.name: testing_enabled
questions.question: Is enable_testing() called in this project? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: cmakelists_lines
questions.question: How many lines are in the CMakeLists.txt file?

questions.name: find_package_count
questions.question: How many find_package commands are in the CMakeLists.txt?

questions.name: components_count
questions.question: How many buildable components are in this repository?

questions.name: output_artifacts
questions.question: What are the names of all output artifacts produced by this build on Windows? (Provide a list)

questions.name: component_types
questions.question: What types of components are built in this repository? (Provide a list)

questions.name: executable_component
questions.question: Which component is the executable on Windows? (state executable name with extension)

questions.name: library_component
questions.question: Which component is the library on Windows? (state library name with extension)

questions.name: hello_world_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build the hello_world component? (Provide a list)

questions.name: utils_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build the utils component? (Provide a list)

questions.name: hello_world_dependencies
questions.question: List all components that hello_world depends on (use Windows artifact names).

questions.name: hello_world_dependency_count
questions.question: How many components does hello_world directly depend on?

questions.name: test_name
questions.question: What is the name of the test in this repository?

questions.name: build_order
questions.question: In what order must the components be built to satisfy all dependencies on Windows? (Provide the build order as a list starting with no external dependencies, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: parallel_build
questions.question: Can both components be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: utils_failure_impact
questions.question: If the utils component fails to build, which other components would also fail on Windows? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: zero_dependency_count
questions.question: How many components have zero dependencies?

questions.name: leaf_components
questions.question: Which component(s) have no other components depending on them on Windows? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: programming_language
questions.question: What programming language is used for the components?

questions.name: test_executable
questions.question: Which component does the test execute on Windows? (use Windows artifact name)

questions.name: test_framework
questions.question: What test framework is used?

questions.name: external_packages_count
questions.question: How many external packages does this repository depend on?

questions.name: unused_source_files
questions.question: What source files (if any) in src/ are not used by any component? (List the files, or answer 'none' if all are used)
